nodes.text: Tales of the Jedi: Dark Lords of the Sith (TPB)
The Tales of the Jedi: Dark Lords of the Sith Trade Paperback is a graphic novel collecting all six issues in the Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi - Dark Lords of the Sith comic series.
In the depths of galactic space, a foolish and arrogant young Jedi awakens an ancient, deadly power. This seductive evil leads him down a path that will make him a Dark Lord of the Sith
